org.spongepowered.api.world

Interface WorldBuilder


  • public interface WorldBuilder
    A builder for Worlds and WorldCreationSettings.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Optional<World> build()
      Attempts to create a World from the specified parameters.
      WorldCreationSettings buildSettings()
      Attempts to create a WorldCreationSettings which may be later used to create a world.
      WorldBuilder dimensionType(DimensionType type)
      Sets the dimension type of the world.
      WorldBuilder enabled(boolean state)
      Sets the world as enabled.
      WorldBuilder fill(WorldCreationSettings settings)
      Fills this WorldBuilder for creating Worlds or WorldCreationSettingss, the builder is then seeded with the values from the given WorldCreationSettings object.
      WorldBuilder fill(WorldProperties properties)
      Fills this WorldBuilder for creating Worlds or WorldCreationSettingss, the builder is then seeded with the values from the given WorldProperties object.
      WorldBuilder gameMode(GameMode gameMode)
      Sets the default GameMode of the world.
      WorldBuilder generator(GeneratorType type)
      Sets the generator type of the world.
      WorldBuilder generatorModifiers(WorldGeneratorModifier... modifier)
      Sets the generator modifiers to use for the world.
      WorldBuilder generatorSettings(DataContainer settings)
      Sets any extra settings required by the GeneratorType or by the WorldGeneratorModifiers.
      WorldBuilder hardcore(boolean enabled)
      Sets whether hardcore mode is enabled.
      WorldBuilder keepsSpawnLoaded(boolean state)
      Sets whether the spawn chunks of the world should remain loaded when no players are present.
      WorldBuilder loadsOnStartup(boolean state)
      Sets whether the world should load when the server starts up.
      WorldBuilder name(String name)
      Sets the name of the world.
      WorldBuilder reset()
      Resets this builder to a clean state.
      WorldBuilder seed(long seed)
      Sets the seed of the world.
      WorldBuilder usesMapFeatures(boolean enabled)
      Sets whether this world should generate map features such as villages and strongholds.

    • Method Detail

      • fill

        WorldBuilder fill(WorldCreationSettings settings)
        Fills this WorldBuilder for creating Worlds or WorldCreationSettingss, the builder is then seeded with the values from the given WorldCreationSettings object.
        Parameters:
        settings - The seed settings
        Returns:
        A new seeded builder

      • fill

        WorldBuilder fill(WorldProperties properties)
        Fills this WorldBuilder for creating Worlds or WorldCreationSettingss, the builder is then seeded with the values from the given WorldProperties object.
        Parameters:
        properties - The seed properties
        Returns:
        A new seeded builder

      • name

        WorldBuilder name(String name)
        Sets the name of the world.
        Parameters:
        name - The name
        Returns:
        The builder, for chaining

      • enabled

        WorldBuilder enabled(boolean state)
        Sets the world as enabled. A world which is enabled but unloaded may be loaded automatically if an attempt is made to transfer an entity to the world using Entity.transferToWorld(java.lang.String, com.flowpowered.math.vector.Vector3d) .
        Parameters:
        state - Should be enabled
        Returns:
        The builder, for chaining

      • loadsOnStartup

        WorldBuilder loadsOnStartup(boolean state)
        Sets whether the world should load when the server starts up.
        Parameters:
        state - Should load on startup
        Returns:
        The builder, for chaining

      • keepsSpawnLoaded

        WorldBuilder keepsSpawnLoaded(boolean state)
        Sets whether the spawn chunks of the world should remain loaded when no players are present.
        Parameters:
        state - Should keep spawn loaded
        Returns:
        The builder, for chaining

      • seed

        WorldBuilder seed(long seed)
        Sets the seed of the world. If not specified this will default to using a random seed.
        Parameters:
        seed - The seed
        Returns:
        The builder, for chaining

      • gameMode

        WorldBuilder gameMode(GameMode gameMode)
        Sets the default GameMode of the world. If not specified this will default to GameModes.SURVIVAL.
        Parameters:
        gameMode - The gamemode
        Returns:
        The builder, for chaining

      • generator

        WorldBuilder generator(GeneratorType type)
        Sets the generator type of the world.
        Parameters:
        type - The type
        Returns:
        The builder, for chaining

      • generatorModifiers

        WorldBuilder generatorModifiers(WorldGeneratorModifier... modifier)
        Sets the generator modifiers to use for the world.
        Parameters:
        modifier - The modifiers
        Returns:
        The builder, for chaining
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If one of the modifiers is not registered in GameRegistry.

      • dimensionType

        WorldBuilder dimensionType(DimensionType type)
        Sets the dimension type of the world.
        Parameters:
        type - The type
        Returns:
        The builder, for chaining

      • usesMapFeatures

        WorldBuilder usesMapFeatures(boolean enabled)
        Sets whether this world should generate map features such as villages and strongholds. If not specified this will default to true.
        Parameters:
        enabled - Are map features enabled
        Returns:
        The builder, for chaining

      • hardcore

        WorldBuilder hardcore(boolean enabled)
        Sets whether hardcore mode is enabled. On servers this will cause players to be banned upon death, on clients the world will be deleted! If not specified this will default to false.
        Parameters:
        enabled - Is hardcore mode enabled
        Returns:
        The builder, for chaining

      • generatorSettings

        WorldBuilder generatorSettings(DataContainer settings)
        Sets any extra settings required by the GeneratorType or by the WorldGeneratorModifiers. If not specified these will default to the settings within GeneratorType.getGeneratorSettings().
        Parameters:
        settings - The generator settings
        Returns:
        The builder, for chaining

      • reset

        WorldBuilder reset()
        Resets this builder to a clean state.
        Returns:
        This builder, for chaining

      • build

        Optional<World> build()
               throws IllegalStateException
        Attempts to create a World from the specified parameters.
        Returns:
        The world, if successful
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If any required parameters are missing

      • buildSettings

        WorldCreationSettings buildSettings()
                             throws IllegalStateException
        Attempts to create a WorldCreationSettings which may be later used to create a world.
        Returns:
        The world settings
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If any required parameters are missing
